Nuno Rodrigues Faria

  • Endereço para acessar este CV: http://lattes.cnpq.br/7516714801154767
  • Última atualização do currículo em 30/09/2018

Nuno is a Research Fellow in the Sciences, Balliol College, University of Oxford, UK; visiting Professor in Bioinformatics at Universidade Federal Minas Gerais, Brazil; Sir Henry Dale Fellow of the Royal Society & Wellcome Trust; Associate member of the Oxford Martin School, University of Oxford; and a visiting Professor at Instituto Evandro Chagas, Ministry of Health, Brazil. Nuno's interests range from virus evolution, phylodynamics, real-time genomic epidemiology, and spatial epidemiology of zoonotic infectious diseases. (Texto informado pelo autor)
